as.description: The element or component the RadioGroup should render as.
as.description_zh: RadioGroup 应呈现为的元素或组件。

defaultValue.description: The default value when using as an uncontrolled component.
defaultValue.description_zh: 用作非受控零部件时的默认值。

by.type: keyof T | ((a: T, z: T) => boolean)
by.description:
Use this to compare objects by a particular field, or pass your own
comparison function for complete control over how objects are compared.
by.description_zh:
使用此函数按特定字段比较对象，或传递您自己的
比较功能，用于完全控制对象的比较方式。

disabled.description:
Whether or not the RadioGroup and all of its RadioGroupOption's' are
disabled.
disabled.description_zh:
无论 RadioGroup 及其所有 RadioGroupOption 是否为
禁用。
